title: 89/131/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 February 1989 amending Decision 88/557/EEC authorizing Member States to permit temporarily the marketing of forest reproductive material not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/404/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 1 February 1989
amending Decision 88/557/EEC authorizing Member States to permit temporarily the marketing of forest reproductive material not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/404/EEC
(89/131/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the annex to Decision 88/557/EEC, for the species Larix decidua Mill. and in relation to the United Kingdom, '300 kg' is replaced by '320 kg' in the column 'kg' and the reference 'PL' is introduced in the column 'provenance'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 February 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2326/66.
(2) OJ No L 151, 17. 6. 1988, p. 82.
(3) OJ No L 307, 12. 11. 1988, p. 43.
